<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following APIs encodes/decodes per-probe information to/from a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32-bit integer which is organized as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#91;2:0&#93; - 0x7, this is reserved for regular discriminator,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          see DWARF discriminator encoding rule</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  if the &#91;28:28&#93; bit is zero:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#91;18:3&#93; for probe id.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#91;15:3&#93; for probe id, &#91;18:16&#93; for dwarf base discriminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#91;25:19&#93; - probe distribution factor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#91;27:26&#93; - probe type, see PseudoProbeType</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#91;28:28&#93; - indicates whether dwarf base discriminator is encoded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#91;30:29&#93; - reserved for probe attributes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a65b110861bfbc06e20befde65915f078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a65b110861bfbc06e20befde65915f078">packProbeData</a>(uint32&#95;t Index, uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>, uint32&#95;t Flags, uint32&#95;t Factor,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">                std::optional&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt; DwarfBaseDiscriminator) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Index &lt;= 65535 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Probe index too big to encode, exceeding 2^16&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &lt;= 3 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Probe type too big to encode, exceeding 3&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Flags &lt;= 0x7);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Factor &lt;= 100 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Probe distribution factor too big to encode, exceeding 100&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t V = (Index &lt;&lt; 3) | (Factor &lt;&lt; 19) | (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &lt;&lt; 26) | 0x7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both the probe id and dwarf base discriminator is small, the probe id</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// space is shared with the dwarf base discriminator, this is to make the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// probe-based build compatible with the dwarf-based profile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pack the dwarf base discriminator into &#91;18:16&#93; and set the &#91;28:28&#93; bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Index &lt;= 8191 &amp;&amp; DwarfBaseDiscriminator &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;DwarfBaseDiscriminator &lt;= 0x7)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">      V |= (1 &lt;&lt; 28) | (&#42;DwarfBaseDiscriminator &lt;&lt; 16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V;</span></CodeLine>
